All Classes

Class Summary
Class
Description
Bishop
This class represents the Bishop game piece.
Chess
CSC335 Due: 2021-12-08 Team 12 Team Project: Chess Jeff Wiederkehr, Chris Herrera, Dylan Snavely, Jason Earl This program enables user's to play a standard game of chess, both locally and networked.
ChessController
This class is the controller for the MVC setup.
ChessGUIView
This class will enable the users to click on a GUI to play the game.
ChessGUIView.compoundKey
This record is used to make a unique key to use in our node map for each i,j index in the 2d grid pane.
ChessModel
This class represents the model in the MVC format of the program.
ChessModel.Move
A way to store info about a piece and its coordinates.
ChessModelTests
This class provides testing for all the non-gui non networked elements of the code base.
ChessMoveMessage
This class will serve as an object that is passed to observers (ChessGUIView) of the model.
King
This class represents the King game piece.
Knight
This class represents the Knight game piece.
OptionsMenu
This class will create an Option menu that enables users to load/save a game and create a new game.
Pawn
This class represents the Pawn game piece.
Piece
This class will ensure every game piece has the same methods and parameters.
Queen
This class represents the Queen game piece.
Rook
This class represents the Rook game piece.
